name: one-time-secret
title: One-Time Secret
description: Allows secrets to be transmitted using the One-Time Secret website.
author: larsasolidor

commands.name: index
commands.title: Send One-Time Secret
commands.description: Stores a secret on One-Time Secret and gives back the shareable URL.

tools.name: send-one-time-secret
tools.title: Send One-Time Secret
tools.description: Stores a secret on One-Time Secret and gives back the shareable URL.

evals.input: @one-time-secret store "santa is real" for 1 week. passcode: "christmas"

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
